short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check out which games have a 100% discount at your favorite stores. Free games from your favorite platforms (Steam, Epic Games, Gog)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to view all games with a current offer that makes them free.
At the moment Steam, Epic Games and Gog are available, but soon also Humble, Itch.io and IndieGala.

Never miss out on an amazing deal on any game again!
